tags.name: block
tags.description: get census block, county, and state FIPS

get.summary: Get FIPS by latitude and longitude
get.description: Get census block, county, and state FIPS based on latitude/longitude input.

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description:
Latitude [-90 90] in decimal or DMS (degrees:minutes:seconds)
Examples: 38.26 or 38:15:36N

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description:
Longitude [-180 180] in decimal or DMS (degrees:minutes:seconds)
Examples: -77.51 or 77:30:36W

parameters.name: censusYear
parameters.description:
Returns results based on census year.
Valid values: 2010 (default)

parameters.name: showall
parameters.description: If the coordinate lies on the boundary of multiple geographies, for a complete list use showall=true.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description:
Format for the returned results.

Defaults to xml.
